summary: An Ordinance appropriating from the General Fund to Scott Calhoun, as Corporation Counsel, the sum of One Thousand Dollars ($1000.00) to pay the expense of taking depositions in the case of William C. Osborne, et al., vs. The City of Seattle, at South Norwalk and Stamford, Connecticut, Brooklyn and New York City, State or New York, and at such other places as may be stipulated between the solicitors for the respective parties, and declaring an emergency.
